sentence: The state now has two Democratic U.S. senators: Sen. Kyrsten Sinema and Sen. Mark Kelly.

title: ‘Culture war’ bills from far-right Arizona Republicans are becoming increasingly ‘extreme’: report

sentence: Brnovich is running for the U.S. Senate seat presently held by Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly and once held by the late Sen. John McCain and, before that, Sen. Barry Goldwater.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Arizona writer lambasts State AG Brnovich for becoming a 'Trump toady' who 'ignores traitors'
